- [ ] Create Agenda (kyber)
- [ ] Invite participants / teams to sign up in Agenda to present their Pathway
- [ ] create Survey - copy most recent and save; in OpenscapesMain > OpenscapesMetrics > Surveys
  - [ ] Add link to Agenda
- [ ] Review roles and timing
